argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | chmatcl.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | chmatcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | chmatcl.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 4 |  | chmatcl.y | |- Y = ( N Mat P ) |
| 5 |  | chmatcl.x | |- X = ( var1 ` R ) |
| 6 |  | chmatcl.t | |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) |
| 7 |  | chmatcl.s | |- .- = ( -g ` Y ) |
| 8 |  | chmatcl.m | |- .x. = ( .s ` Y ) |
| 9 |  | chmatcl.1 | |- .1. = ( 1r ` Y ) |
| 10 |  | chmatcl.h | |- H = ( ( X .x. .1. ) .- ( T ` M ) ) |
| 11 | 3, 4 | #P_pmatring | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> Y e. Ring ) |
| 12 |  | #P_ringgrp | |- ( Y e. Ring -> Y e. Grp ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> Y e. Grp ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) -> Y e. Grp ) |
| 15 | 3 | #P_ply1ring | |- ( R e. Ring -> P e. Ring ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_anim2i | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( N e. Fin /\ P e. Ring ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) -> ( N e. Fin /\ P e. Ring ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` P ) = ( Base ` P ) |
| 19 | 5, 3, 18 | #P_vr1cl | |- ( R e. Ring -> X e. ( Base ` P ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) -> X e. ( Base ` P ) ) |
| 21 | 11 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) -> Y e. Ring ) |
| 22 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` Y ) = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 23 | 22, 9 | #P_ringidcl | |- ( Y e. Ring -> .1. e. ( Base ` Y ) ) |
| 24 | 21, 23 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) -> .1. e. ( Base ` Y ) ) |
| 25 | 18, 4, 22, 8 | #P_matvscl | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ P e. Ring ) /\ ( X e. ( Base ` P ) /\ .1. e. ( Base ` Y ) ) ) -> ( X .x. .1. ) e. ( Base ` Y ) ) |
| 26 | 17, 20, 24, 25 | #P_syl12anc | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) -> ( X .x. .1. ) e. ( Base ` Y ) ) |
| 27 | 6, 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_mat2pmatbas | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) -> ( T ` M ) e. ( Base ` Y ) ) |
| 28 | 22, 7 | #P_grpsubcl | |- ( ( Y e. Grp /\ ( X .x. .1. ) e. ( Base ` Y ) /\ ( T ` M ) e. ( Base ` Y ) ) -> ( ( X .x. .1. ) .- ( T ` M ) ) e. ( Base ` Y ) ) |
| 29 | 14, 26, 27, 28 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) -> ( ( X .x. .1. ) .- ( T ` M ) ) e. ( Base ` Y ) ) |
| 30 | 10, 29 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) -> H e. ( Base ` Y ) ) |
